doc:
Chester M. Franklin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chester_M._Franklin 0 Chester Mortimer Franklin (September 1, 1889 – March 12, 1954) was an American film director and actor active mainly in the silent era. Born in San Francisco, he was the brother of Sidney A. Franklin. In the late 1910s he co-directed with his brother Sidney several films with all children casts for William Fox. Chester_Mortimer_Franklin ( September_1_,_1889 – March_12_,_1954 ) was an_American_film_director_and_actor_active mainly in the_silent_era . Born in San_Francisco , he was the_brother of Sidney_A._Franklin . In the_late_1910s he co-directed with his_brother_Sidney_several_films with all_children casts for William_Fox .
